actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent aE)

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

addHardwareDeviceToRent

public void addHardwareDeviceToRent()
This is a method to rent a Hardware device. This method creates an object "addHaredwareDeviceToRent" and stores the data in the hardware array list. Performing this action inputs values of the description, manufacturer,down payment and daily rate to create a new object of type HardwareDeviceToRent, which becomes added to array list of HardwareDevice.

addHardwareDeviceToSell

public void addHardwareDeviceToSell()
This is a method to sell a hardware device. This method creates a object "addHardwareDeviceToSell" and stores the data in the generator array list. Performing this action inputs values of the description, manufacturer,down price and tax amount are used to create a new object of type HardwareDeviceToSell, which becomes added to the array list of Generators.

clearRent

public void clearRent()
This is a method to clear the entered content of the box of renting hardware devices. This method creates an object "clearRent". When this button is pressed, the text is cleared from all text fields

clearSell

public void clearSell()
This is a method to clear the entered content of the text fields of selling hardwre devices. This method creates an object "clearSell". When this button is pressed, the text is cleared from all text fields

displayAll

public void displayAll()
This is a method to display all the information of the Hardware devices to rent and sell. This method creates an object "displayAll". When this button is clicked, the information relating to properties is displayed

This method contains of the content of the GUI.(Text box, Label and Buttons)

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
This is a method of the class.

rentHardwareDevice

public void rentHardwareDevice()
This is a method to rent a Hardware device. This method creates an object "rentHardwareDevice". The device number, customer name, date of hire, date of return and the number of days are entered into the GUI. When button is clicked, the input value of the device number is checked. If a suitable value has been entered, it is used to get the appropriate device from the array list of hardwares. The method to rent out the Hardware device in the HardwareToRent class is called afterwards.

returnHardwareDevice

public void returnHardwareDevice()
This is a method to return the rented device. This method creates an object "returnHardwareDevice". The device number is entered into the GUI. When this button is pressed, the input value of the device number is checked. If a suitable value has been entered, it is used to get the appropriate device from the array list of Generators. The method to return an hardware in the HardwareDEviceToRent class is called afterwards.

sellHardwareDevice

public void sellHardwareDevice()
This is a method to sell a hardware device. This method creates an object "sellHardwareDevice". The Generator number, the customer name, sell date and tax amount are entered into the GUI. When this button is clicked, the input value of the device number is checked. If a suitable value has been entered, it is used to get the appropriate device from the array list of hardwares. The method to sell a hardware device in the HardwareDeviceToSell class is then called.
